title: Collins Street Walk
creator_credit: Paul Connor, Tony Evans and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: Children from Fitzroy Primary School are shown on the National Trust’s Collins Street Walk. They then use the graphics facility at Swinburne Institute’s computer installation to create an animated film based on the experience. Suitable for upper primary level.
